publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2564 Mr Bruce McFee: Scottish Standard—That the Parliament welcomes the newly-launched Scottish Standard, Scotland’s only pro-independence newspaper, as a valuable addition to Scotland’s otherwise unionist press.

S2M-2564 Mr Bruce McFee:Scottish Standard—That the Parliament welcomes the newly-launched Scottish Standard, Scotland’s only pro-independence newspaper, as a valuable addition to Scotland’s otherwise unionist press. Supported by: Christine Grahame*
S2M-2564 Scottish Standard (lodged on 10 March 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*

S2M-2564 Scottish Standard (lodged on 10 March 2005) Fergus Ewing*, Chris Ballance*, Tommy Sheridan*, Stewart Stevenson*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Alex Neil*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*

S2M-2564 Mr Bruce McFee: Scottish Standard—That the Parliament welcomes the newly-launched Scottish Standard, Scotland’s only pro-independence newspaper, as a valuable addition to Scotland’s otherwise unionist press. *R* Supported by: Christine Grahame, Mr Adam Ingram, Fergus Ewing, Chris Ballance, Tommy Sheridan, Stewart Stevenson, Roseanna Cunningham, Alex Neil, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Rob Gibson, Brian Adam, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-2564 Scottish Standard (lodged on 10 March 2005) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2564 Scottish Standard (lodged on 10 March 2005) Frances Curran*
